docs.abstract: The age of your house may affect your risk for being overweight.
docs.lead_paragraph: Many people opt for newer homes because they are cleaner, bigger and often have more amenities. But new research shows old houses in old neighborhoods may be better for your health.
docs.snippet: The age of your house may affect your risk for being overweight.
